summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is the latest model of mobile device and has many amazing features, including a 5.7-inch HD display, 64GB of storage, 4GB of RAM, an 18MP rear camera, 8MP front camera, 3,000 mAh battery, NFC support, dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, IP68 water resistance rating, and pre-installed apps and games. It also comes with accessories such as a USB Type-C cable, wall charger, earphones and a protective case. The user should set up their device according to the instructions in the user manual that comes with it.
